summary: The Veterans Health Administration operates the nation's largest health care system. In recent years, VHA has had difficulty attracting and retaining enough staff to meet the growing health care needs of veterans. We testified about our recent work on VHA's workforce challenges, including: meeting staffing needs to manage referrals to health care providers outside of VHA recruiting and retaining mental health care staff to provide...
title: Veterans Health Care: Staffing Challenges and Recommendations for Improvement
